name: Memoria (itch)
description:
Memoria is an exploration game, in which you play as a memory eater. Help release trapped souls, but don't take too long or you'll become one yourself!

This game was created for My First Game Jam: Winter 2018 (theme: Memory). It's currently a prototype, but we intend to add some features.  Built in Unreal Engine 4 using a mix of 2D and 3D elements.

Controls

Movement: W/A/S/D - Up, Left, Down, Right

Eat Memories: Spacebar/Enter

Credits/Team

Matt Roberts (@GrandishDoc) - Scripting/FX/Levels

Marcela Roberts (@awkward_games) - Art/Animation/Design

Crispin Avila (@Avicr) - Music/Sound
